H0.text: The main feature of the human illness diabetes is the body's inability to produce what hormone. Insulin

H1.text: The main feature of the human illness diabetes is the body's inability to produce what hormone. Glucagon

H2.text: The main feature of the human illness diabetes is the body's inability to produce what hormone. Adrenaline

H3.text: The main feature of the human illness diabetes is the body's inability to produce what hormone. C65R

A4.text: Diabetes is due to either the pancreas not producing enough of the hormone insulin or the cells of the body becoming unresponsive to insulin's effects.

A5.text: Insulin is the principal hormone that regulates the uptake of glucose from the blood into most cells of the body
